trans-unit.source: Specifies the rows or columns that are resized by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
This enumeration is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
Space is redistributed based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*> properties.

If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between rows, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is above that row.

- When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is below that row.

- When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.

- When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.

If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between columns, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the left.

- When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the right.

- When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.

- When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
To be added.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is below it.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the right.
To be added.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is above it.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the left.
To be added.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the rows that are above and below the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
To be added.
